name: Bhop Craze
description: BhopCraze is THE bunnyhopping game. Simple but satisfying bunny hopping and surfing concept combined with lots of fresh mechanics like slow motion blocks, double jump zones and many more! Play alone or compete against friends and other players on dedicated servers on pre-built maps or on maps created by the BhopCraze community found in the Steam Workshop. Save replays of your best runs and share them with friends. As mentioned above, BhopCraze has full integration with the steam workshop. You can create maps in a convenient in-game editor and download maps created by other BhopCraze players!
